short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An alternative approach to export reports to high quality PDF in servicenow.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension enhances the existing Export to PDF option of reports in Service Now. When this extension is enabled, Instead of opening the default dialog box when clicked on Export to PDF option, a new tab with a printer-friendly version of the report is displayed. Where you can configure PDF print options using the inbuilt print dialog box in your browser. This extension leverages the "sysparm_media=print" feature within Service Now to export high-quality PDF of reports.



If you face any issues, please raise an issue in the GitHub repository given below.

The source is available at : 
https://github.com/karthikchiru12/SN-Report-to-PDF
